title: Newton's Method With $$n=3$$
text: To find $$x_3$$, use the equation $$x_n=x_n-1-\frac{f{\left(x_n-1\right)}}{\operatorname{f'}\left(x_n-1\right)}$$ with $$n=3$$ and the value of $$x_2$$ stored on the calculator.
